account-exists-with-different-login: This account already exists with a different login method
album-delete-msg: Do you want to delete the album {name} from the computer and from your library?
begin-account: To begin, click an account or create one to logon
browse-create-shortcut: Browse the item and type a name for the shortcut
cannot-apply-style: Unable to apply style, please check your source code again
change-color: Change the color of your window borders, Start menu, and taskbar
change-display: Change the appearance of your display
change-visuals: Change the visuals and sounds on your computer
chess-changed-settings-finish: The new settings apply to your next game.
chess-changed-settings-prompt: These settings won't apply to the game in progress. What do you want to do?
chess-changed-settings-quit: Quit and start a new game with new settings
chess-continue-saved-game: Do you want to continue your saved game?
chess-fifty-move: There has been no progress for fifty moves; the game is a draw.
chess-game-draw-footer: This game has been counted as a draw in your statistics. If you return to the game, the draw will not be counted again.
chess-game-in-progress-prompt: What do you want to do with the game in progress?
chess-game-loss-footer: This game has been counted as a loss in your statistics. If you return to the game, the loss will not be counted again.
chess-hide-tip-hint: You can turn off tips in "Options".
chess-high-graphics-warning: Higher graphics quality is intended for capable computers and mobile devices. It may cause extreme lag on low-end devices. Use with caution.
chess-insufficient-material: There are too few pieces left for a checkmate; the game is a draw.
chess-missing-feat: Your device/browser doesn't support WebGL_multi_draw extension which might impact rendering performance causing lags.
chess-options-random-styles: Randomly choose piece style and board
chess-options-reset-board: Rotate board back after free view
chess-options-rotate-board: Rotate board when playing head to head
chess-resign-prompt: Are you sure you want to resign this game?
chess-return-game-subtext: Use Undo to reverse your last moves and try again.
chess-stalemate: Stalemate, the game is a draw.
chess-stats-loss-count-warning: This counts as a loss in your statistics.
chess-threefold: This position has been repeated three times; this game is a draw.
chess-tip-badmove: If you make that move your King would be in check. That move is not allowed.
chess-tip-bishop: Bishops may move diagonally any number of spaces in a straight line.
chess-tip-black: It's black's turn, click a black piece to move it.
chess-tip-blocked: This piece can't move there. The path is blocked.
chess-tip-check: Your king is in check. You may only move to: 1. Capture the attacking piece, 2. Place one of your own pieces between the attacker and your King (unless the attacker is a Knight), 3. Move the King away from the attack
chess-tip-king: The King may only move one space in any direction.
chess-tip-knight: Knights must move one square up or down, and two squares over, or vice versa. Knights are the only piece that can jump over other pieces.
chess-tip-pawn: Pawns may only move forward one space, or two spaces if they haven't moved yet. Pawns may capture by moving forward and to the side one space.
chess-tip-queen: Queens may move in any of the eight directions in a straight line
chess-tip-rook: Rooks may move up, down, left, or right any number of spaces in a straight line.
chess-tip-selfcheck: You can't move your King onto a square that is under attack by another piece. Your opponent has a piece on the board that can move onto that square from its current position
chess-tip-white: It's white's turn, click a white piece to move it.
chess-unsupported: Your device/browser doesn't support WebGL 2 or it might be disabled, thus 3D view is unavailable. The game will fall back to 2D view
click-organize: Click Organize, then click Manage libraries to include items.
click-theme: Click a theme to change the desktop background, window color and sound all at once
confirm-delete-msg: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {name} from the computer?
confirm-replace: Do you want to replace it?
confirm-reset: Do you want to reset all your statistics to zero?
confirm-reset-all: Do you want to revert all changes?
confirm-save: Do you want to save your changes?
confirm-to-delete-account: I understand, please delete my account
confirm-watch-ad: Watch an ad to continue or subscribe to remove ads completely?
contains-ads: This copy of Windows contains ads, click here to resolve
create-account-logon: Create an account to logon to Windows
create-playlist-description: Create a playlist of music, pictures, or both.
create-shortcut: What item would you like to create a shortcut for?
display-language-info: Install or uninstall languages that Windows can use to display text where supported recognize speech and handwriting.
excluded-songs-title: These songs are deleted from the Music Library. To restore it, remove it from this list.
exit-game-prompt: What do you want to do with the game in progress?
fav-music-settings-title: Which songs do you want in your Favorite Music playlist?
fav-pict-settings-title: Which pictures do you want in your favorite pictures slide show?
filename-exist: A file with the same name already exists.
game-sorry: Sorry you lost this game. Better luck next time!
info-change-background: Click a picture to make it your desktop background, or browse from your device.
info-change-name: This name will appear on the Welcome screen and is visible to other users. It is different from the username that is used to log on.
info-change-password: If your password contains capital letters, they must be typed the same way every time you log on.
info-change-picture: The picture you choose will appear on the Welcome screen and on the Start menu.
info-create-shortcut: This wizard helps you to create shortcuts to your Android apps or existing programs in this simulator
info-delete-account: Please note that deleted account cannot be recovered, all settings and files will be lost.
info-link-account: Link with your social accounts to make login quick and easy.
info-live-background: You can also use any mp4 video as live or animated background.
install-program-description: Enter the URL of the program to install and personalize to your preferences.
install-program-instruction: Fill out the following info and click Next to continue.
invalid-name: Only Latin characters and numbers are allowed in username
invalid-slide-show: There are no valid picture files in this folder.
invalid-timeout-msg: The timeout you have selected is invalid. Select a value greater than zero.
keyboards-other-input-languages-info: To change your keyboard or input language click Change keyboards.
listmaker-choose-media: Select a location to browse for media.
listmaker-empty-name-msg: The name of your {listType} is empty.
listmaker-enter-name: Enter a name for the {listType}. To enter text using the onscreen keyboard, press OK on the remote control or double-click the text box.
listmaker-exist-name-msg: The name of your {listType} "{name}" already exists. Select another name.
listmaker-invalid-chars-msg: The name of your {listType} cannot contain the following characters: \/:*?|<>."
listmaker-quit-msg: If you stop creating this {listType} without saving, you will lose your changes to it.
many-fails: Too many unsuccessful login attempts. Please try again later
media-only-confirm: Media Only mode keeps Windows Media Center displayed in full screen. In this mode, the minimize and close buttons are hidden. Do you want to enter Media Only mode?
medialib-cancel-desc1: Any changes you have made will not be saved.
medialib-finish-no: No, I want to make more changes
medialib-removefolders-desc: Clear the check boxes for the folders you want to remove from the library:
medialib-review-desc: Windows Media Center will search for media in the following locations:
medialib-selectaction-desc: You can add or remove folders that Windows Media Center searches for media files or upload files from your device. Uploaded files will be at {path}. What do you want to do?
medialib-selectlib-desc: You can select folders for each media library, and the media files within these folders will appear in Windows Media Center. Which library would you like to set up?
missing-feat-msg: Hey! This feature is currently unavailable but we're working hard on it. Please check back later!
name: Name
network-error: Please check your internet connection and try again
no-exe: Cannot install programs on a simulator
no-fav-music-warning: We couldn't find any favorite music to play. Do you want to change how your favorites are selected?
no-fav-picts-warning: We couldn't find any favorite pictures to play. Do you want to change how your favorites are selected?
no-items-library: There are no items in your library.
no-picts-selected-msg: Check at least one option under 'Use these pictures'.
no-songs-selected-msg: Select at least one option under 'Use these songs'.
notification-area-help: Customize which icons and notifications appear in the area
open-specific-pages: Open a specific page or set of pages
overwrite-existing-playlist-msg: A playlist named {name} already exists in your Music Library. Do you want to overwrite it?
password-mismatch: Password and confirmation password does not match
password-to-delete-account: Enter your password below to delete account.
pawn-promotion-maintext: You can promote your pawn! What piece do you want to promote your pawn to?
playlist-delete-msg: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the playlist {name} from the computer?
preview-bsod: Maximize the window to preview the result
question: Question
quit-and-start-a-new-game: Quit and start a new game
rating-shortcut-title: You can rate pictures and music more easily as they play by using shortcut keys, which are the 0-5 keys on the remote control or on the keyboard.
ready-to-install-description: Setup is now ready to begin installing {0} on your device.
ready-to-install-instruction: Click install to continue with the installation, or click Back if you want to change any settings.
restart-to-apply-changes: You may need to restart Windows to apply these changes
run-info: Type the name of a program and Windows will open it for you.
run-try-again: Make sure you typed the name correctly, and then try again.
save-as-playlist-empty-name-msg: Enter a name for the playlist before you select Save.
save-as-playlist-instruction: Enter the name of the playlist. To enter text using the onscreen keyboard, press OK on the remote control or double-click the text box.
save-as-playlist-invalid-chars-msg: Windows Media Center cannot save your playlist at this time. Make sure to use only valid characters in the playlist name, and try to save the playlist again later.
save-as-playlist-quit-msg: Would you like to save this as a playlist before you leave?
save-before-restart: Before restarting, save any open files and close all programs.
search-engine-warning: This search engine might not work properly due to technical limitations.
select-account: Select an account to logon to Windows
select-snip: Select snip mode to start snipping
select-uninstall-program: To uninstall a program, select it from the list and then click Uninstall, Change, or Repair.
set-search-engine-info: Set which search engine is used when searching from the {0}.
slide-show-screen-saver-title: Windows Media Center can play a slide show of your favorite pictures as a screen saver.
song-delete-msg: Do you want to delete the song {name} from the computer and from your library?
sound-comms-50: Reduce the volume of other sounds by 50%
sound-comms-80: Reduce the volume of other sounds by 80%
sound-comms-intro: Windows can automatically adjust the volume of different sounds when you are using your PC to place or receive telephone calls.
sound-playback-inst: Select a playback device below to modify its settings:
sound-recording-inst: Select a recording device below to modify its settings:
sound-theme-inst: To change sounds, click a program event in the following list and then select a sound to apply. You can save the changes as a new sound scheme.
sound-theme-intro: A sound theme is a set of sounds applied to events in Windows and programs. You can select an existing scheme or save one you have modified.
start-menu-help: Customize how links, icons, and menus look and behave in the Start Menu
subscription-model: Simple subscription model, one-tap purchase, cancel anytime
support-win7-simu: Support Win7 Simu development while enjoying the app ad-free
theme-previews-offline: No internet connection. Theme previews are not available offline.
title: Title
toggle-windows-features: Turn Windows features on or off
type-account: Type a username and password to logon to Windows
unlink-error: Cannot unlink the only remaining login method
use-rating-shortcut: Let me use shortcut keys to set ratings
use-slide-show-screen-saver: Play my favorite pictures as a screen saver
wait-shutdown: Please wait while your computer shuts down
weak-pass: Password should be at least 6 characters
what-do-you-want-to-do: What do you want to do?
wmc-empty-lib: There are no items in this library yet - Windows Media Center is searching for media files in the background. To add more items, upload your files to {path}.
wmc-search-instruction: To search, click or tap on the text box on the left and enter search keywords.
wmc-settings-playnavsound: Play sounds when navigating Windows Media Center
